item.title: Explanations
item.description: Find explanations and definitions for common terms and concepts related to self-hosting Topics Explanations: Servers Daemons Webservers Domain names DNS Reverse proxies Port forwarding Containers Virtualization Virtual private networks Operating systems Servers Servers are machines whose purpose is to provide a service or content over a network. They are typically administered remotely and only connect physically to power and a network. They “serve” content or services using software daemons. Bare metal servers are not virtualized.
